headline.main: Grant and Lee Tanks Firing 75s A Big Factor in Repelling Rommel

lead_paragraph: WITH THE BRITISH FORCES, in Libya, June 2 -- American medium tanks -- General Grants and General Lees -- are the pride of the British Eighth Army and a nightmare for the Nazis. The British swear by them and the Nazis swear at them.
abstract: role of U S tanks in Libya discussed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
